data.comment: The big names in today's match at BC Place have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Ted Unkel, has blown to start the match.
Ted Unkel signals a Vancouver throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Vancouver.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Kansas City.
Gadi Kinda is booked for the away team.
Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Kansas City push forward at BC Place and Graham Zusi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
Kansas City's Gadi Kinda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Vancouver.
Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Vancouver's area.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Ted Unkel awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Kansas City just outside Vancouver's area.
Roger Espinoza for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kansas City.
Goal! Alan Pulido heads Kansas City into a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Roberto Puncec to set up the goal.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Kansas City.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Derek Cornelius (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
Kansas City pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Kansas City at BC Place.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Ted Unkel signals a Vancouver throw-in in Kansas City's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Jake Nerwinski levels the match at 1-1.
David Milinkovic with an assist there.
Free kick Kansas City.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Alan Pulido's finish is wide of the goal.
Ted Unkel awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ted Unkel signals a Kansas City throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Gadi Kinda puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Luis Martins instrumental with a fine assist.
In Vancouver Vancouver drive forward through Cristian Dajome. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kansas City are coming forward and Roger Espinoza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Throw-in Vancouver.
So close for Vancouver as [47]'s shot comes back off the post.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
The first half has been concluded at BC Place.
The second-half is now underway.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
Throw-in Kansas City.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Kansas City.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Vancouver will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Kansas City at BC Place.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Johnny Russell for Kansas City drives towards goal at BC Place. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Kansas City at BC Place.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Vancouver.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vancouver to check on Alan Pulido, who is grimacing with pain.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alan Pulido for Kansas City is back on the field again.
Ted Unkel awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Vancouver's Yordy Reyna gets in a shot on goal at BC Place. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Vancouver's [49] breaks free at [24]. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ted Unkel awards Kansas City a goal kick.
The away team replace Johnny Russell with Gerso Fernandes.
Fredy Montero is on a sub for David Milinkovic for Vancouver.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vancouver surge into the attack at BC Place but Derek Cornelius’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Ted Unkel signals a Vancouver throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In Vancouver, Jasser Khemiri (Vancouver) misses the target with a header.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Tosaint Ricketts is replacing Cristian Dajome for Vancouver at BC Place.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Fredy Montero (Vancouver) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Kansas City.
Vancouver drives forward and Lucas Cavallini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ted Unkel waits before resuming play because Matt Besler for Kansas City is still down.
Kansas City's Matt Besler is back in action after a slight knock.
At BC Place the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kansas City make their second substitution with Gianluca Busio replacing Gadi Kinda.
The away team have replaced Alan Pulido with Erik Hurtado. This is the third substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
